identity.name: Neuronova
identity.tagline: L'Innovation Technologique au Cœur de l'Afrique
identity.mission: Propulser les entreprises africaines vers le futur grâce à l'IA, la cybersécurité et le design digital.

typography.import_instructions: Import 'Clash Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts or local assets. If Clash Display is unavailable, use 'Outfit'.

gradients.text_gradient: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-white via-blue-100 to-blue-300

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to avoid 'plastic' feel.
visual_enhancers.patterns: Integrate geometric circuit-board patterns inspired by African textiles (Kente/Mudcloth) but digitized. Use SVG backgrounds with low opacity.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-white/10. On hover: border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(56,189,248,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium border border-white/5
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-12 px-8 rounded-full

cards.service_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl border border-white/10 bg-white/5 p-8 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-500

navigation.classes: fixed top-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-[90%] max-w-5xl rounded-full border border-white/10 bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-md z-50 px-6 py-4 flex items-center justify-between shadow-2xl

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/70)

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install framer-motion @studio-freight/react-lenis lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
SETUP: Configure Tailwind for dark mode class strategy.
FONTS: Add 'Clash Display' and 'Manrope' to index.css via @import or font-face.
COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for complex interactive elements (Dialog, Form, Select) but style them to match the 'Neuronova' dark theme.
PAGES: Create Home, Services, About, Contact pages as requested.
WHATSAPP: Implement a floating WhatsApp button (fixed bottom-right) with z-index 50.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Use 'gap' property for spacing, avoid margins where possible.
Mobile-first: Always design for mobile (grid-cols-1) then scale up (md:grid-cols-2).
Avoid 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic tech copy related to Neuronova's mission.
